## TemplateValue type

Represents the types of values that can be interpolated into a template.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TemplateValue<TScope, TParent = any> = Binding<TScope, any, TParent> | string | number | Directive | CaptureType<TScope>;
```
